Required Medical Examination Steps

  1. Schedule Appointment

    Contact one of the approved panel physicians to schedule your medical examination.

  2. Complete Medical History Form

    Fill out DS-3025 form before your appointment.

  3. Medical Examination

    Undergo physical examination and required vaccinations as determined by the physician.

  4. Laboratory Tests

    Complete blood work and other required tests as specified.

  5. Chest X-Ray

    Get chest X-ray at approved radiologist facility.

  6. Pay Medical Examination Fee

    Pay the required fee directly to the panel physician (approximately €400-500).

Additional Requirements for B-2 Visa Applicants

  • Bring valid passport and previous medical records
  • Complete vaccination requirements based on age and medical history
  • Allow 2-3 business days for results processing
